scripts.typecheck: concurrently --names "CLIENT,SERVER,COMMON" --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "yarn --cwd packages/client typecheck" "yarn --cwd packages/server typecheck" "yarn --cwd packages/common typecheck"
scripts.biome:check: concurrently --names "CLIENT,SERVER,COMMON" --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "yarn biome check ./packages/client/src" "yarn biome check ./packages/server/src" "yarn biome check ./packages/common/src"
scripts.biome:fix: concurrently --names "CLIENT,SERVER,COMMON" --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "yarn biome check --write ./packages/client/src" "yarn biome check --write ./packages/server/src" "yarn biome check --write ./packages/common/src"
